survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Mobile Food Delivery Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user experiences with mobile food delivery applications to improve service quality and customer satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use mobile food delivery apps in a typical month?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of selection. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use mobile food delivery apps in a typical month?

questions.question_text: Which mobile food delivery apps have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional entries.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include a text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which mobile food delivery apps have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a food delivery app? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type where respondents can drag and drop options. Ensure the interface is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: ranking (custom widget). Allow respondents to reorder the options.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a food delivery app? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using mobile food delivery apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using mobile food delivery apps?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience with mobile food delivery apps?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: text input (OPEN_TEXT). Allow for long-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience with mobile food delivery apps?
